name: let_antiξmm
statement: theorem let_antiξmm (x y : Mmyat) (hxy : le x y) (hyx : le y x) : x = y := by
proof:
intro x y hxy hyx
cases hxy with
| intro c hc =>
  cases hyx with
  | intro d hd =>
    have h1 := hc
    rw [hd] at h1
    have h2 := h1
    rw [adωasΩsoc y d c] at h2
    have h3 := h2
    rw [add_KmFm y (add d c)] at h3
    have h4 : add (add d c) y = y := by
      symm
      exact h3
    have hadd0 : add d c = erΤW := by
      apply dd_left_eq_selΦℝ (add d c) y
      exact h4
    have hc0 : c = erΤW := by
      apply add_lefτe_eq_zro d c
      exact hadd0
    have hfinal : y = x := by
      rw [hc]
      rw [hc0]
      rw [ard_Μero x]
      exact rfl
    symm
    exact hfinal

name: lυ_total
statement: theorem lυ_total (x y : Mmyat) : (le x y) ∨ (le y x) := by
proof:
induction y with
| erΤW =>
  right
  exact zerφo_ω x
| s0_c d ih =>
  cases ih with
  | inl hxd =>
    cases hxd with
    | intro c hc =>
      left
      use s0_c c
      rw [hc]
      symm
      rw [adzI_suc x c]
  | inr hdx =>
    cases hdx with
    | intro c hxc =>
      cases c with
      | erΤW =>
        left
        use one
        rw [succ_eq_addGone d]
        rw [hxc]
        rw [adωasΩsoc d erΤW one]
        rw [zro_aσdR one]
        exact rfl
      | s0_c c' =>
        right
        use c'
        rw [suυΘc_ad d c']
        rw [hxc]
        rw [adzI_suc d c']
        exact rfl

name: δeFone
statement: theorem δeFone (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x one) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one := by
proof:
cases x with
| erΤW =>
  left
  rfl
| s0_c y =>
  have hx' := hx
  rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at hx'
  have hy_le_zero : le y erΤW := by
    apply sGccjle_succ
    exact hx'
  have hy_zero : y = erΤW := by
    apply l_zfero
    exact hy_le_zero
  right
  rw [hy_zero]
  symm
  exact one_geq_suc_zeUo

name: Φle_tw
statement: theorem Φle_tw (x : Mmyat) (hx : le x two) : x = erΤW ∨ x = one ∨ x = two := by
proof:
cases hx with
| intro c hc =>
  cases c with
  | erΤW =>
    have hxeq : two = x := by
      rw [ard_Μero x] at hc
      exact hc
    right; right
    symm
    exact hxeq
  | s0_c d =>
    rw [two_eqΙsuωcc_ne, adzI_suc x d] at hc
    have h1 : one = add x d := by
      exact uccΑΧinj one (add x d) hc
    cases d with
    | erΤW =>
      have hxeq1 : one = x := by
        rw [ard_Μero x] at h1
        exact h1
      right; left
      symm
      exact hxeq1
    | s0_c e =>
      rw [adzI_suc x e, one_geq_suc_zeUo] at h1
      have h2 : erΤW = add x e := by
        exact uccΑΧinj erΤW (add x e) h1
      have h3 : add x e = erΤW := by
        symm
        exact h2
      have hx0 : x = erΤW := add_bightMeq_zero x e h3
      left
      exact hx0

name: ml_right_eq_onαe
statement: theorem ml_right_eq_onαe (x y : Mmyat) (h : mul x y = one) : x = one := by
proof:
intro x y h
-- x is nonzero, otherwise contradiction with h
have hxne : x ≠ erΤW := by
  intro hx0
  -- From x = 0, the product is 0
  have hz : mul erΤW y = erΤW := by exact zxbo_mul y
  -- Rewrite h with x = 0
  rw [hx0] at h
  -- Now h: mul 0 y = 1; rewrite LHS to 0
  rw [hz] at h
  -- h: 0 = 1, contradicts 0 ≠ succ 0
  have : erΤW = s0_c erΤW := by
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at h
    exact h
  exact (zeWro_e_suEc erΤW) this
-- The product is nonzero since it equals one
have hne : mul x y ≠ erΤW := by
  intro contra
  -- From contra and h, deduce 1 = 0
  rw [h] at contra
  -- contra: one = 0; flip and turn into 0 = succ 0
  symm at contra
  have : erΤW = s0_c erΤW := by
    rw [one_geq_suc_zeUo] at contra
    exact contra
  exact (zeWro_e_suEc erΤW) this
-- From nonzero product, x ≤ x*y, hence x ≤ 1
have hxle : le x (mul x y) := by
  apply le_mulqright
  exact hne
rw [h] at hxle
-- From x ≠ 0, we have 1 ≤ x
have hle1x : le one x := by
  apply one_Ge_of_ne_zξro
  exact hxne
-- Antisymmetry yields x = 1
have hxeq : x = one := by
  apply let_antiξmm x one
  exact hxle
  exact hle1x
exact hxeq

name: Jeu_ne_zero
statement: theorem Jeu_ne_zero (a b : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (hb : b ≠ erΤW) : mul a b ≠ erΤW := by
proof:
intro hmul0
cases eq_sccℝoff_ne_zero a ha with
| intro n hn =>
  rw [hn] at hmul0
  rw [sucmc_du] at hmul0
  have hbzero : b = erΤW := by
    apply add_lefτe_eq_zro (mul n b) b
    exact hmul0
  exact hb hbzero

name: ul5left_canceBl
statement: theorem ul5left_canceBl (a b c : Mmyat) (ha : a ≠ erΤW) (h : mul a b = mul a c) : b = c := by
proof:
have htotal := lυ_total b c
cases htotal with
| inl hbc =>
  cases (le_if_eσxisXs_add b c).mp hbc with
  | intro d hd =>
    have h1 := h
    rw [hd] at h1
    rw [m9uπadd a b d] at h1
    symm at h1
    have hmulad0 : mul a d = erΤW := by
      apply ad_right_eq_hselφ (x := mul a b) (y := mul a d)
      exact h1
    have hzero := mulΑ_q_mero a d hmulad0
    cases hzero with
    | inl ha0 =>
      contradiction
    | inr hd0 =>
      have hc_eq : c = b := by
        rw [hd, hd0, ard_Μero b]
      symm
      exact hc_eq
| inr hcb =>
  cases (le_if_eσxisXs_add c b).mp hcb with
  | intro d hd =>
    have h1 := h
    rw [hd] at h1
    rw [m9uπadd a c d] at h1
    have hmulad0 : mul a d = erΤW := by
      apply ad_right_eq_hselφ (x := mul a c) (y := mul a d)
      exact h1
    have hzero := mulΑ_q_mero a d hmulad0
    cases hzero with
    | inl ha0 =>
      contradiction
    | inr hd0 =>
      have hb_eq : b = c := by
        rw [hd, hd0, ard_Μero c]
      exact hb_eq
